name: Ghostscape 3D
description:
Ghostscape 3D is my latest 3D Point & Click horror adventure game best played in the dark with headphones on late at night!!

This game contains mature content, bloody graphics, scary moments and a very creepy atmosphere, it also saves your progress as you play!!

PC UPDATE 1.1

Redone the FULL ending (much more positive & just cooler)

Updated texture on hanging bodies

PC VERSION 1.1 - REMASTERED: I have built a version using better graphics and fixed some bugs with a better ending now added.

Please check it out and remember I am just one dude making these games so any support for my 5-6 months of full-time work on this game is seriously appreciated ;-) Even sharing a link with friends would be awesome!!

A video walkthrough and location of all items can be found here:-
Ghostscape 3D video walkthrough

Please email me to let me know of any issues, problems, bugs etc and I'll do my best to get them sorted ASAP!!
